info.title: Commonground Gateway EAV endpoints
info.description: This documentation contains the EAV endpoints on your commonground gateway.

total.decription: The total amount of items that match your current query

anyOf.description: A Program is a EducationalOccupationalProgram offered by an institution which determines the learning progress to achieve an outcome, usually a credential like a degree or certificate. Based on https://schema.org/EducationalOccupationalProgram.

applicationStartDate.description: The day that people can start to apply for this Program.

applicationDeadline.description: The day that people can no longer apply for this Program.

maximumEnrollment.description: The maximum number of students who may be enrolled in the program..

occupationalCategory.description: A category describing the job, preferably using a term from a taxonomy such as BLS O*NET-SOC, ISCO-08 or similar.

occupationalCredentialAwarded.description: A description of the qualification, award, certificate, diploma or other occupational credential awarded as a consequence of successful completion of this course or program.

educationalCredentialAwarded.description: A description of the qualification, award, certificate, diploma or other educational credential awarded as a consequence of successful completion of this course or program.

items.description: A Participant is a person who participates in a Course or an Program.

dateOfAcceptance.description: The date of acceptance of this Participant.

items.description: A Course is a course within a program in which participants can participate. Based on https://schema.org/Course.

text.description: The actual content of this Course.

hasCourseInstance.description: An instance of a Course which is distinct from other instances because it is offered at a different time or location or through different media or modes of study or to a specific section of students.

occupationalCredentialAwarded.description: A description of the qualification, award, certificate, diploma or other occupational credential awarded as a consequence of successful completion of this course or program.

educationalCredentialAwarded.description: A description of the qualification, award, certificate, diploma or other educational credential awarded as a consequence of successful completion of this course or program.

skills.description: An array of URLs pointing to skills related to this course

competences.description: An array of URLs pointing to competences this course teaches the participant

products.description: An array of URLs pointing to products from the pdc related to this course

video.description: The url linking to a video which belongs to this course

timeRequired.description: The time Required to complete this Course.

ID.name: id
ID.description: ID of the object that you want to target

Page.name: page
Page.description: The page of the  list that you want to use

Limit.name: limit
Limit.description: The total amount of items that you want to include in a list

Start.name: start
Start.description: The firts item that you want returned, is used to determine the list offset. E.g. if you start at 50 the first 49 items wil not be returned
